title: first-post
description: A short description of the post.
contents: I will use the “EDFacts_math_achievement_lea_2010_2019” to make my data visualizations on a dashboard format. I am interested in this dataset becuase it centralizes data provided by LEA or the local education agency. I want to focus on the academic acheivement in mathmatics becuase I feel like I can get a better understanding of performance trends by looking at just one educational area.
